document.full_text: anti-u.s. iraqi cleric moqtada al-sadr brought thousands of shi'ite supporters onto baghdad streets thursday in a show of force against any extension of the u.s. military presence in iraq past a year-end deadline.
document.title: sadr followers rally against u.s. army staying in iraq
lines_and_colors: anti-u.s. iraqi cleric moqtada al-sadr brought thousands of shi'ite supporters onto baghdad streets thursday in a show of force against any extension of the u.s. military presence in iraq past a year-end deadline.
